Description: The book presents a comprehensive yet accessible look at phages, blending humor and scientific depth to explain their life cycles, ecological roles, and potential applications.
Author: Merry Youle

Description: This book will teach you how to do data science with R: You’ll learn how to get your data into R, get it into the most useful structure, transform it and visualize.
Author: Çetinkaya-Rundel, and Garrett Grolemund

Description: It provides an in-depth exploration of microbial structure, physiology, genetics, ecology, and evolution, as well as their roles in health, disease, and biotechnology.
